scripts.build:css: concat -o dist/css/style.css css/bootstrap.min.css css/uikit.min.css css/fontawesome/css/all.css css/custom/main.css && cleancss -o dist/css/style.min.css dist/css/style.css
scripts.build:js: concat -o dist/js/bundle.js js/jquery-3.6.4.min.js js/popper.min.js js/bootstrap.min.js js/uikit.min.js js/uikit-icons.min.js js/custom/app.js && uglifyjs dist/js/bundle.js -o dist/js/bundle.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
